oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The role of consumer in saving the cultural landscape in the countryside
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Savisalo, Leena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Landscape and recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the study is to observe and to evaluate participation in the land use process and the potential of civil activity in influencing the impacts of planning in the cultural landscape in the countryside.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Savisalo, Leena (2004) The role of consumer in saving the cultural landscape in the countryside. Poster at: 6th European IFSA symposium, Vila Real, Portugal, 4-7 April, 2004.
